Proprio un bel gioco action-puzzle da giocare tutto d'un fiato (la prima volta si completa in una giornata senza troppo impegno). Si... effettivamente √® un gioco forse un po' troppo breve: ci sarebbe stata bene ancora qualche ora di game-play ma √® davvero un piccolo capolavoro e non fa rimpiangere dei (pochi) euro spesi per l'acquisto.
Challenging puzzles and a great story. Love the song at the end too.

The game is very, very good,
The narration is interesting and mysterious without overdoing it, the antagonist is hyper endearing, the levels and gameplay are PERFECT.
Too bad the game is so short, I finished it in a little more than an hour.

Testovac√≠ch m√≠stnost√≠ je mnoho a ka≈æd√° m√° sv≈Øj v√Ωchod do dal≈°√≠ho testu ale existuje i nƒõjak√° cesta pryƒç?

D√≠ky neust√°l√Ωm novink√°m a r≈Øznorodosti h√°danek nebude hra stereotypn√≠ z√°le≈æitost√≠ jak by se mohlo zd√°t, naopak hra bƒõ≈æ√≠ plynul√Ωm tempem za doprovodu neust√°l√Ωch pozn√°mek umƒõl√© inteligence GLaDOS kter√© v√°s bude neust√°le komandovat co≈æ zap≈ô√≠ƒçin√≠ touhu j√≠t do dal≈°√≠ho testu jen aby jste p≈ôi≈°li na zp≈Øsob jak se ji zbavit a ut√©ci pryƒç z vƒõdeck√©ho komplexu.

Hodnocen√≠: 8/10

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

English

Portal, a game in which you find yourself unknown as trapped with advanced artificial intelligence that controls the entire research center and forces you to undergo its tests using a special portal weapon. There are many test rooms and each has its exit to the next test, but is there a way out?

Thanks to the constant news and variety of puzzles, the game will not be a stereotypical matter as it might seem, but the game runs at a steady pace accompanied by constant GLaDOS artificial intelligence notes that will constantly bother you, which will force you to find a way to destroy it and escape from the science complex

Rating: 8/10
